credit_line: Gift of The Museum at The Fashion Institute of Technology
title: Sidewall
description: Grid design containing alternating medallions divided by bands of stylized floral and foliate motifs. The one medallion is a winged putti with a blanket enclosed within a beaded circle. The other is a ruin with columns and foliage enclosed within an octagon. Printed in shades of blue and black on a white ground.
name: Sidewall
